markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand Cane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2154)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Though it appears to be a basic cane, the inner workings of the _wand cane_ are an intricate network of lenses and magical circuits, with a slot at the top to insert a [wand](/Traits.aspx?ID=164). The _wand cane_ then spends 1 minute attuning to the wand, after which the wand can be used through the cane.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand Cane
